job_description:
Business Development Executive (Immediate Hiring)

We are seeking a Business Development Executive with experience in the IT sector to manage client interactions, generate new business opportunities, and support customers in understanding product and service functionalities. The role involves lead generation, explaining IT services, following up with clients, and ensuring smooth communication throughout the sales cycle. A Computer Science background and basic understanding of website/app workflows are advantageous.

Job Responsibilities

Business Development & Sales

  • Identify, research, and generate new business leads through calls, emails, online platforms, and networking.
  • Conduct introductory calls with clients to understand requirements and present suitable IT services.
  • Explain product features, website workflows, and application functionalities clearly.
  • Cold call potential customers and follow up with existing clients to promote services.
  • Convert leads into opportunities and achieve business targets.
  • Maintain long-term relationships with clients through regular communication and professional interaction.

Client Handling & Follow-Up

  • Communicate regularly with existing clients to ensure satisfaction and service continuity.
  • Follow up on monthly/yearly package renewals and payment reminders.
  • Explain newly released features and updates to clients.
  • Address customer queries and provide basic functional support when required.
  • Maintain accurate records of calls, leads, conversations, and client updates.

Technical / Functional Guidance

  • Guide customers on how websites, web applications, and e-commerce platforms function.- Explain step-by-step processes to non-technical users in simple language.
  • Provide product walkthroughs and assist with basic configurations or app updates if needed.
  • Ensure a smooth and positive customer experience throughout support interactions.

Job Requirements

  • Strong understanding of:
  • IT services & software solutions
  • Website and web application workflows
  • E-commerce fundamentals (catalog, checkout flow, payment gateways, order tracking, etc.)
  • Excellent communication skills (verbal & written) and customer-handling ability.
  • Strong negotiation, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to explain technical concepts in simple terms to non-technical users.
  • Ability to manage multiple leads, calls, and follow-ups professionally.
  • Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, or mobile app concepts is a plus (not mandatory).
  • Familiarity with hosting, domains, deployments, or basic configuration tasks is an advantage.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field (mandatory).
  • Experience: 6 months to 1 year in business development, client handling, and IT sales.

Application Details

Interested candidates should submit their resumes, portfolios, and cover letters with the subject line: “Business Development Executive” to hr@ynotinfo.com.
summary: Seeking a Business Development Executive with IT sales experience to generate leads, manage client relationships, and provide technical guidance on IT services and e-commerce solutions. Requires a Computer Science background and 6+ months of relevant experience.

job_title: DevOps Engineer (Platform & Infrastructure – E-Invoicing & Integration Solutions)
job_description:
DevOps Engineer (Platform & Infrastructure – E-Invoicing & Integration Solutions)

We are seeking a proactive and technically skilled DevOps Engineer to support and manage the infrastructure and platforms powering our E-Invoicing and Integration Solutions. The role focuses on ensuring system stability, automation, monitoring, and secure deployments across development, testing, and production environments. The ideal candidate will work closely with development, QA, security, and support teams to enable reliable application delivery while maintaining high availability and operational efficiency in compliance with UAE regulatory and interoperability requirements.

Key Responsibilities

  1. Infrastructure & Platform Operations
  2. Support and maintain Linux-based infrastructure across multiple environments.
  3. Ensure availability, reliability, and performance of application and platform services.
  4. Assist in capacity planning, resource utilization, and performance optimization.

  5. Perform routine system maintenance, patching, and upgrades.

  6. CI/CD & Deployment Support

  7. Implement and maintain automated build and deployment pipelines.
  8. Support application deployments, releases, rollbacks, and configuration changes.
  9. Collaborate with development teams to streamline deployment workflows.

  10. Ensure consistency across development, testing, staging, and production environments.

  11. Containerization & Automation

  12. Deploy and manage containerized applications.
  13. Support container lifecycle management and image versioning.
  14. Assist in automating operational tasks using scripts and DevOps tools.

  15. Promote infrastructure and deployment best practices.

  16. Monitoring, Troubleshooting & Incident Management

  17. Monitor system performance, availability, and logs.
  18. Proactively identify and resolve infrastructure or application issues.
  19. Participate in incident response, root cause analysis, and corrective actions.

  20. Track incidents and service requests through a ticketing or ITSM process.

  21. Security, Compliance & Operational Readiness

  22. Apply infrastructure-level security controls and access management.
  23. Support secure data exchange and platform compliance requirements.
  24. Assist with backup, restore, and disaster recovery processes.
  25. Maintain operational documentation, runbooks, and standard procedures.

Qualifications & Experience

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
  • 4 years plus of experience in DevOps, Infrastructure, or System Administration roles.
  • Hands-on experience with Linux environments.
  • Exposure to CI/CD pipelines, container platforms, and automation tools.
  • Basic understanding of cloud platforms (Azure/AWS) is an advantage.
  • Experience supporting production environments is mandatory.
  • Familiarity with integration platforms or API-based systems is a plus.
  • Awareness of E-Invoicing or regulatory platforms is beneficial.

Key Competencies

  • Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
  • Understanding DevOps principles and operational best practices.
  • Ability to work across multiple environments and priorities.
  • Detail-oriented with a focus on system reliability and uptime.
  • Good communication and collaboration skills.
  • Willingness to learn and adapt to evolving technologies and platforms.

Preferred Certifications

  • Docker or Kubernetes Fundamentals (advantage).
  • Cloud Fundamentals – Azure / AWS (preferred).
  • Linux Administration Certification (advantage).
  • ITIL Foundation or equivalent (preferred).

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at mitty.j@difinitydigital.com.

We are seeking an experienced and result-driven Digital Marketing Specialist to join our Business Development Team. As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for setting up, implementing, and managing the overall company's digital marketing strategy. This role requires a strong understanding of digital marketing trends, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement digital marketing strategy through campaigns across various channels, including search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, email marketing, social media, content marketing, LinkedIn automation, etc.
  • Follow best practices for social media marketing on different platforms.
  • Launch optimized online advertisements to increase company and brand awareness.
  • Create and manage link-building and content marketing strategies.
  • Measure ROIs and KPIs.
  • Plan and execute social media marketing strategies to build brand awareness, engage with the audience, and drive traffic to the website.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and digital marketing best practices, and apply them to ongoing campaigns.
  • Monitor and manage online reputation through proactive engagement on social media and review platforms.
  • Stay informed about changes in search engine algorithms and implement necessary adjustments to maximize organic search visibility.

Preferred Skills:

  • MBA-Marketing preferable, Diploma in Digital Marketing.
  • Proven work experience in digital marketing, preferably in a similar role.
  • Strong knowledge of digital marketing concepts, strategies, and tactics.
  • Proficiency in using digital marketing tools, including Google Analytics, Google Ads, SEO tools, email marketing platforms, and social media management tools.

  • Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
  • Up-to-date knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and ranking factors.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create engaging and persuasive content.
